DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Taxis the entity to the runway start, plays an animation to execute a takeoff and initial climb, then starts a fly-heading task in the same direction. If taking off from an entity it is embarked on, it will disembark when it takes off.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>runway</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Runway</myLabel> <myToolTip>A route that describes the runway. Use only two points.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Routes</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtRoutesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
